name: The Ill Divinity
description:
The divinity of your lands is ill. As the shaman of your village, it is your duty to heal him!
Go inside its body and use your power to heal him, but be careful about the macrobias and the lymphocytes that can kill you!

The Ill Divinity is a platformer game where you have to finish each screen before the divinity dies. If you stay idle, you can use a healing aura that will heal it and make you earn some time. It also neutralized macrobias for a few seconds. But be careful, it boosts lymphocytes!

This is my third participation in compo and, even though this game is a bit unfinished, I am pretty proud of it. Hope you will like it!

I used:
- Unity
- Gimp
- Bandlab
- Audacity

20/04:
- Corrected a wrong respawn position
- Made the tutorial shown adapted to the chosen keyboad configuration
- Put a limit on the vertical acceleration to prevent collision detection fails

NB: When I uploaded the new version on itch.io, it deleted the old one, the uploaded source code remains unchanged though and contains the game at its state at the end of the Compo.
